name: The Evil Tower
description:
Movement: WASD
Attack: J
Jump: K
Defend: L

Gamepad Support

This is more of a self-imposed homework assignment than a game. I made this to prove to myself that I could make something feature complete. It has (almost) all the trappings of something I'd feel comfortable expanding into a commercial release. It has:

  • Start menu
  • Options menu for sound, video, and controls
  • Intro sequence
  • Multiple rooms with short transitions between them
  • Dialogue boxes
  • Traditional side-scroller action mechanics (attack, jump, block)
  • Different enemies with different ai
  • A boss
  • Sound effects where relevant

Like I said before, this isn't a complete game, and should only take about 5 minutes to beat. It's more of a prototype, except I'm not testing out a new concept, I'm testing my ability to finish something.

Feel free to let me know if you find any issues. Thanks for checking out this page, and enjoy the game!
